mapper.insert: insert into intakeInfo ( pnum, userid, num, desc_kor, gram, nutr_cont1, nutr_cont2, nutr_cont3, nutr_cont4, nutr_cont5, nutr_cont6, nutr_cont7, nutr_cont8, nutr_cont9, regdate ) values ( intakeInfo_seq.nextval, #{userid}, #{num}, #{desc_kor}, #{gram}, #{nutr_cont1}, #{nutr_cont2}, #{nutr_cont3}, #{nutr_cont4}, #{nutr_cont5}, #{nutr_cont6}, #{nutr_cont7}, #{nutr_cont8}, #{nutr_cont9}, #{regdate} )
mapper.select: select * from intakeInfo where userid = #{userid} and regdate = #{regdate}
select * from intakeInfo where userid = #{userid} and regdate between #{regdate1} and #{regdate2}
select count(*) as total from intakeInfo

select count(*) from foodinfo where
desc_kor fdgrp_nm
like '%' || #{searchWord} || '%'

select NUM, FOOD_CD, FDGRP_NM, DESC_KOR, SERVING_WT, NUTR_CONT1, NUTR_CONT2, NUTR_CONT3, NUTR_CONT4, NUTR_CONT5, NUTR_CONT6, NUTR_CONT7, NUTR_CONT8, NUTR_CONT9, ANIMAL_PLANT, BGN_YEAR from foodinfo where ${searchItem} like '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' order by NUM desc

select round(a.kcal, 2) month5, round(b.kcal, 2) month4, round(c.kcal, 2) month3, round(d.kcal, 2) month2, round(e.kcal, 2) month1 from (select avg(nutr_cont1) kcal from INTAKEINFO where regdate between ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(sysdate, 'MM'), -4) and ADD_MONTHS(LAST_DAY(sysdate), -4)) a, (select avg(nutr_cont1) kcal from INTAKEINFO where regdate between ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(sysdate, 'MM'), -3) and ADD_MONTHS(LAST_DAY(sysdate), -3)) b, (select avg(nutr_cont1) kcal from INTAKEINFO where regdate between ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(sysdate, 'MM'), -2) and ADD_MONTHS(LAST_DAY(sysdate), -2)) c, (select avg(nutr_cont1) kcal from INTAKEINFO where regdate between ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(sysdate, 'MM'), -1) and ADD_MONTHS(LAST_DAY(sysdate), -1)) d, (select avg(nutr_cont1) kcal from INTAKEINFO where regdate between TRUNC(sysdate, 'MM') and LAST_DAY(sysdate)) e

select round(avg(nutr_cont2),2) as nutr_cont2, round(avg(nutr_cont3),2) as nutr_cont3, round(avg(nutr_cont4),2) as nutr_cont4 from intakeInfo where regdate between TRUNC(sysdate, 'MM') and LAST_DAY(sysdate)

select round(avg(nutr_cont2),2) as nutr_cont2, round(avg(nutr_cont3),2) as nutr_cont3, round(avg(nutr_cont4),2) as nutr_cont4, round(avg(nutr_cont4),2) as nutr_cont5, round(avg(nutr_cont4),2) as nutr_cont6, round(avg(nutr_cont4),2) as nutr_cont7, round(avg(nutr_cont4),2) as nutr_cont8, round(avg(nutr_cont4),2) as nutr_cont9 from intakeInfo where regdate between TRUNC(sysdate, 'MM') and LAST_DAY(sysdate)
